articles.description: Skyy Clark, a 6-foot-2 guard ranked No. 25 in the ESPN 100, announced he is headed to Illinois on Thursday.
articles.content:
Top-25 senior Skyy Clark, who decommitted from Kentucky last month, announced Thursday he is heading to Illinois.
Clark chose the Fighting Illini over a final six that also included Louisville, Tenn… [+2451 chars]
